name: Waziri Gosht Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Waziri Gosht Recipe: Boneless beef 1kg Cardamom 2 Bay leaf 2 Star anise 3 Clove 6 Cinnamon 5pieces Salt as required Garlic 6cloves Ginger 6pieces Water as required Butter 250gm Black pepper 1tsp Soya sauce 1tbsp Chili garlic sauce 1tbsp Oil 1tbsp Green chilies for garnish Coriander for garnish
instructions: In a pressure cooker add meat , salt , bay leaf , star anise. Add cloves , cinnamon and ginger garlic cook for 20 to 25 min , Now open and remove meat in another pan , now through water and spices. Now in a pan add oil , butter , black pepper, soya sauce , and chili sauce on low flame. Now add meat cook for 5 min. Lastly add coriander and green chilies and serve .
